metadata.creator: unknown
metadata.description: This video features an interview with a woman (Julia) from Nicaragua who emigrated to Canada because of the political revolution in Nicaragua. They discuss the dangers of living in Nicaragua at the time and the influence of the United States and its imperialism as well.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Interview with a Woman from Nicaragua
metadata.subject: Nicaragua; revolution; revolucion nicaraguense; immigration; inmigracion; United States of America imperialism; imperialismo de los Estados Unidos
